keys: lamierine del seghetto a mano per metalli

          <title>
            <string language="en">Damped oscillation experiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dämpfung Pendelbewegung Experiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience atténuée d'oscillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência umedecida da oscilação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento smorzato di oscillazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετριασμένο πείραμα ταλάντωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimento humedecido de la oscilación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental set-up used to demonstrate damped oscillations using a hacksaw blade with its one end clamped and a mass attached to its free end.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bench clamps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cards</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">damping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hacksaw blades</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oscillations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rulers</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine experimentelle 
Installation, die verwendet wird, um Dämpfung Pendelbewegungen mit 
einem Metallsägeblatt mit seinem einem Ende, das festgeklemmt wird 
und einer Masse zu demonstrieren, die zu seinem freien Ende angebracht
wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation 
expérimentale employée pour démontrer des oscillations atténuées 
en utilisant une lame de scie à métaux avec son une extrémité 
maintenue et une masse attachée à sa extrémité libre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação 
experimental usada demonstrar oscilações umedecidas usando uma 
lâmina do hacksaw com sua uma extremidade apertada e uma massa unida 
a sua extremidade livre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto 
sperimentale usata per dimostrare le oscillazioni smorzate usando una 
lamierina del seghetto a mano per metalli con la relativa 
un'estremità premuta e una massa fissata alla relativa estremità 
libera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση που 
χρησιμοποιείται για να καταδείξει τις μετριασμένες ταλαντώσεις 
χρησιμοποιώντας μια hacksaw λεπίδα με ένα τέλος της που 
στερεώνεται και μια μάζα που συνδέεται με το ελεύθερο τέλος της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición 
experimental usada para demostrar oscilaciones humedecidas usando una 
lámina de la sierra para metales con su un extremo afianzado con 
abrazadera y una masa asociada a su extremo libre.</string>
          </description>
